title: Arizona becomes first state to support driverâ€™s licenses and IDs in iPhone Wallet
content:
Google and Apple have been interested in supporting government-issued IDs in their mobile payment apps for several years at this point. Android 13 will require new devices to support secure storage of IDs, but Apple has now beat Google to the punch. Residents of the U.S state of Arizona can now store their driver’s license

The post Arizona becomes first state to support driver’s licenses and IDs in iPhone Wallet appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The ability to store driver's licenses and state IDs in the Wallet on iPhones is finally going live, starting with Arizona.
